section.name: Dependencies Element
section.p: The <dependencies> element declares the set of dependencies that a resource has on other resources. The <dependencies> element may contain 0..n <include> elements where each include is a reference to the dependent resource.

tr.td: The name of the resource that the dependency refers to. <include key="xmlParserAPIs">
